post_detail.description:
Challenge:

ClickFireMedia was challenged to create a Facebook app for DBA and their client, Nine West.

Execution:

Using the Instagram API, CFM built a photo gallery Facebook app. The app automatically included any Instagram photo with Nine West's designated campaign hashtag, #LoveFury. Each photo with the #LoveFury hashtag was automatically entered into a photo contest. The photo with the most likes and shares wins.
post_detail.title: Nine West App
